const response = await client.ingest.putPipeline({
  id: "attachment",
  description: "Extract attachment information",
  processors: [
    {
      attachment: {
        field: "data",
        properties: ["content", "title"],
        remove_binary: true,
      },
    },
  ],
});
console.log(response);
